name: GDG Kaduna IO Extended '17

venue.name: Aptech Computer Education
venue.address_1: Opposite Prison Yard Independence Way, Kaduna, Nigeria, Kaduna

description: GDG KADUNA is holding this event to familiarize the local developers here with Google Technologies and Resources at their disposal. This will create an awareness of several opportunities and resources to the local developers community in KADUNA. Streaming the I/O’17 keynote session will expose the developers community to the latest trends in technology and how to get involved in the trend. We shall be discussing around the technologies presented in the keynote.

description:

In ICE Congress Center, Krakow, Poland

Google Developer Days (GDD) are global events showcasing the latest developer products and platforms from Google to help you quickly develop high quality apps, grow & retain an active user base, and tap into tools to earn more.Â https://g.co/dev/gdd-europe&sa=D&ust=1500758774555000&usg=AFQjCNH5YeJHREURVa0W3_S7-tmJdQOTkg">More Info

Extended Events

GDD Extended events are organized by local developer communities around the world and include a variety of options for attendees—from livestreaming sessions to local demos, hackathons, codelabs, and more.

name: DevFest Northeast 2017
description:
THE Developer Festival! The biggest Google tech conference in NorthEast Nigeria carefully crafted for you by GDG community! All about Android, Web and Cloud from the NorthEast Nigeria Organizers

Host by GDG KASU in Collaboration with GDG Kaduna and GDG Bauchi
how_to_find_us: CoLab No 4, Barnawa Close, Barnawa, Kaduna, 800242, Kaduna

name: GDG Kaduna Mobile Web Certification Study Jams

venue.name: KAD ICT HUB
venue.address_1: 47 Kanta Road / Independence Way, Kaduna, Nigeria

description:
• What we'll do
Study Jams are community-run study groups for developers covering a range of Google Developers content. Typically, Study Jams focus on completing a course, but some may focus on mastering a skill or product area.
The Study Jams objective is to raise the technical proficiency of global community members through the highest possible course completion rate.

• What to bring
Pen, Notebook, laptop and extension wires.

• Important to know

name: Cloud Study Jam Kaduna

venue.name: Aptech Computer Education
venue.address_1: Opposite Prison Yard Independence Way, Kaduna, Nigeria, Kaduna

description: Learn the fundamentals of the Google Cloud Platform, how to run containers on it and how to use the platform for data engineering. Attendees get free access to the labs ($70+ value)

name: GDG Kaduna Build Actions with Your Community

venue.name: Aptech Computer Education
venue.address_1: Opposite Prison Yard Independence Way, Kaduna, Nigeria, Kaduna

description:
• What we'll do
Actions on Google and Google Assistant are one of the major Google technical areas and we want to invite the whole developer community to learn about creating Actions for the Google Assistant.
“Build Actions for Your Community” is an open and modular event series designed by Google and offered to community organizers worldwide. You can offer opportunities to developers attending your events to learn how to build Actions for the Google Assistant that are useful for their community - whether it's a professional network, interest group, or your hometown. This way, they can build something in an area that they care about or are interested in.

• What to bring
Laptop and probably an extension cable.

• Important to know

name: IWD GDG Kaduna (International Womens Day) 2018

venue.name: Macrobox Hub
venue.address_1: 5 Camp Road U/Rimi Kaduna North, Kaduna Nigeria

description:
• What we'll do
International Women’s Day, which is officially on March 8, 2018, is a day to celebrate the achievements of women while calling for greater equality within our communities. As Women Techmakers powered by Google Developer Group Kaduna (GDG Kaduna), we plan to do this by improving our programs thus increasing women GDG members through increased collaboration and raising awareness through social media.
Women are no longer comfortable taking the back seat in STEM and getting little or no recognition for their work. Instead, we are working harder and harder to be accepted, recognized and celebrated for our contributions to the technological ecosystems in our communities. So, this year’s theme “Building a New Horizon” is indeed very apt as it represents the global move women are making in technology.

• What to bring

• Important to know

name: GDG Kaduna ML Study Jams and TensorFlow Dev Extended

venue.name: Macrobox Hub
venue.address_1: 5 Camp Road U/Rimi Kaduna North, Kaduna Nigeria

description:
Details

The objective of Study Jams is to raise the technical proficiency of our global community members through the highest possible course completion rate.

Study Jams are a great opportunity to bring members of your community together to learn something new or advance their knowledge, with the help of a community facilitator. Skills learnt in this workshop can be used for personal development or career advancement.

As a complement to large tech talks and viewing party events that you may already attended, the Machine Learning Study Jam framework brings together a small group of members from our community who are interested in learning about Machine Learning.

name: GDG Kaduna Flutter I/O Extended 2018

venue.name: Macrobox Hub
venue.address_1: 5 Camp Road U/Rimi Kaduna North, Kaduna Nigeria

description:
Flutter is another open-source cross-platform framework prepared for mobile app platforms. Since its "beta release", in the end of March, it got huge attention on Github and appeared to be one of the most trending repos.
Join us to discover its neat features!
- Android & iOS - brief history, problems
- Flutter - what's new?
- Comparison with React Native and others
- Dart (2) - short intro to language
- Get Started Tutorial
- Widget - the UI programming in Flutter
- Can Flutter be used from Android/iOS code (and vice-versa)?
- Integration with existing apps
- Fuchsia (Android replacement)
- Codelabs

There will be some food & drinks sponsored by Flutter.io

We hope to see you here.

name: GDG Kaduna I/O Extended 2018

venue.name: Macrobox Hub
venue.address_1: 5 Camp Road U/Rimi Kaduna North, Kaduna Nigeria

description:
Google I/O is an annual developer conference held by Google in Mountain View, California. I/O showcases technical in-depth sessions focused on building web, mobile, and enterprise applications with Google and open sources such as Android, Chrome and Chrome OS, APIs, Google Web Toolkit, App Engine, and much more. • What GDG Kaduna is trying to do is to extend it by bring together local developers within our community and host our own I/O Extended event here in our chapter.

• What to bring

• Important to know

name: Devfest 2018 Kaduna

venue.name: KAD ICT HUB
venue.address_1: 47 Kanta Road / Independence Way, Kaduna, Nigeria

description:
DevFest events cover multiple product areas such as Android, Firebase, Google Cloud Platform, Google Assistant, Flutter, machine learning with TensorFlow, and Mobile Web.

The various chapters such as GDG Kaduna, Google Cloud Developer Community Kaduna, GDG Zaria,GDG Kafanchan will be clustering together to host Devfest 2018 and session will be assigned to indivuals to make it a colourful event and the names and topic they will be speaking on is below.
NAFIU GARBA will be talking on Flutter, MUBARAK AMINU will be talking on Firebase, ROBERT JOHN will be talking on TensorFlow and Google cloud, PETER VICTOR will be talking on Material design, VICTOR BALA will be talking on PWA, YAHYA ALI will be talking on Android, ALIYU SABIU will be talking on Android, AMINU B IBRAHIM will be doing the Keynote, MODUPE will be talking on Google Action, VICTORIA will be talking on WIT, NNAMDI will be talking on IoT.

When developers come together to exchange ideas, amazing things can happen.
